product_name: Keen Maderas Slip-On Shoes - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether they're cruising the beach or chasing down an ice-cream truck, kids will love the simple style and great comfort of the Keen Maderas Slip-On shoes. Comfortable and breathable cotton canvas uppers offer a natural, easygoing look; dual stretch gores make them easy to slip on and off. Cotton canvas linings are soft against feet. Molded rubber footbeds provide cushioning and comfort for all-day wear. Low-profile, nonmarking rubber outsoles on the Keen Maderas Slip-On Shoes supply good, all-around traction. Closeout.
short_description: Whether they're cruising the beach or chasing down an ice-cream truck, kids will love the simple style and great comfort of the Keen Maderas Slip-On shoes.
